row.process: !. /etc/profile.d/proxy.sh @echo off !reg add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings" /v ProxyEnable /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f !reg add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings" /v ProxyServer /t REG_SZ /d omcscbanajnfzj.netbjgoao.vcnhaszy.oraclevcn.com:3128 /f !!ECHO Test Environment Variables !SET testpod_loginid=srinivas.nadimetla@bakerhughes.com !SET testpod_password=K:\incoming\SaaS\Password\passwordSecure.epw !SET testpod_url=https://epm-test-a633165.epm.us6.oraclecloud.com/HyperionPlanning !SET testpod_domain=a633165 !SET testpod_dailybackuname=SyncFromQA2PROD !SET testpod_password=L:\incoming\SaaS\Password\passwordSecure.epw dir echo "started" !CALL epmautomate login SVC-EPM_INT_ADMIN@bakerhughes.com G04L0nd0n@n0w %testpod_url% %testpod_domain% !CALL epmautomate.bat login "SVC-EPM_INT_ADMIN@bakerhughes.com" "G04L0nd0n@n0w" "https://epm-test-a633165.epm.us6.oraclecloud.com/HyperionPlanning" !echo "hello world" !CALL epmautomate logout cd D:\Custom\EPMAutomate\bin\ CALL TEST.bat echo "ended"
